a.xlink:title: Smallholders by Pakistan bands: marginal <5 acres (~<2 ha), small 5–12.5, medium 12.5–25. Progressive adopters emerge under HYV package; revenue via lambardar.
flow=revenue/tax | I=settlement & revenue codes | K=post-reform ledgers; assessment | periodicity=annual | discretion=medium
Refugee allottees consolidated in Punjab; many regularized pre-1960s. Participation in HYV package varies with water & credit access.
flow=revenue/tax | I=revenue codes; mutation regularization | K=village rolls; assessment | periodicity=annual | discretion=medium
Sindh sharecropping persists; evictions rise with mechanization. Bhutto (1972) reforms introduce tenant purchase rights; implementation uneven.
flow=rent/share (crop) | I=customary tenancy; limited protections | K=batai/adhi norms; contested cost-sharing | periodicity=seasonal | discretion=high
flow=claims/authority | I=1972 reforms (tenant purchase right) | K=mutation/purchase procedures | periodicity=episodic | discretion=high
Militant resistance coincident with mechanization & tenure conflict.
a.text: Hashtnagar, KP (early 1970s): MKP-led tenant uprising against khan landlords.

a.xlink:title: flow=command/authority | I=landlord discretion; weak tenant right enforcement | K=estate orders; mechanization | periodicity=episodic | discretion=high
